content.body: Oh, I’m relieved to hear that. I was just beginning to wonder if I had completely misunderstood something. You don't need to apologise! Thanks for the clarification. :)

content.body: hi yall! does tc39 have any general newsletters or rss feeds that one can subscribe to to get notified on the latest proposals?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: hi yall! does tc39 have any general newsletters or rss feeds that one can subscribe to to get notified on the latest proposals?

content.body: sorry if this is not where i should be posting, completely new to this

content.body: I think this is an appropriate place to post that question.

content.body: I believe the answer is no, but I'm not positive.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I believe the answer is no, but I'm not positive.

content.body: But if you 'watch' https://github.com/tc39/proposals, I think you'll get a notification whenever that repo changes, which might suffice?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: But if you 'watch' https://github.com/tc39/proposals, I think you'll get a notification whenever that repo changes, which might suffice?

content.body: (actually, you'll get notifications for more than just that, but you can filter out what you're not interested in)
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: (actually, you'll get notifications for more than just that, but you can filter out what you're not interested in)

content.body:
Yeah I did that. Just feels like we should have a better way…

Like, I’d love for there to be some sort of newletter that gets sent every week (or even month) on updates to the things TC39 is working on

content.body: It can even be an RSS feed! But I bet people have thought of that and maybe there were issues with it?
